name: Battle of Krill Mountain Memorial Rollercoaster
name_original: Battle of Krill Mountain Memorial Rollercoaster
description:
Time has come to remember the fallen

Ride the Battle of Krill Mountain Memorial Rollercoaster. Honor your ancestors and the old gods.

Controls

A/Left Arrow - Turn left

D/Right Arrow - Turn right

Escape - Pause

Controller Stick or d-pad to steer

Creators

Code and Art: Substandard Shrimp

Audio: MRBHIndustries
